mediaDisplay.text:
To see all your images without folders, select "Pictures" in the main menu. 1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Pictures" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote to display the Pictures screen. The Pictures screen displays all the photos available on the media player. 3. Use the arrow keys on the remote to browse through your pictures.
To see pictures in their folders, select "Browse Folders" in the Pictures menu. 1. When the Pictures screen is displayed, press "Menu" again to display the Pictures menu, select "Browse Folders", and click "OK" to display your picture folders. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to browse through your folders and view the pictures stored in them.
To search for a particular picture, select "Search" in the Pictures menu. 1. When the Pictures screen is displayed, press "Menu" again to display the Pictures menu, select "Search" in the Pictures menu, and press "OK" to open the Search Pictures screen. 2. On the Search Pictures screen, use the remote and the keyboard to enter the name of a photo.
NOTE: You can also select "Devices" on the main menu to view your pictures in their folders.
